column4: It has put some bad code to affect the performance o our computers.
Why is it only after the upgrade?
How can I revert?
some new version of some software has bugs
my cpu is idling at 40% wtf?
this is unacceptable, goes to 100% if I load firefox
Doesn't look like just 1 process in particular
xchat and xorg both usng around 30% cpu each why???
Firefox was fine before this upgrade
G40 Thinkpad
what cpu?
clock speed?
ok fluctuations are normal
what is eating it up right now?
depending on your conky set up and refresh/reload rates you've set conky will probably take 1-5% of cpu at almost all times
yes we heard.
wait a few seconds
get rid of 'quiet' as the boot option at grub
wheres that?>
can't remember if you need to change 'splash' to 'nosplash'
at boot, when at grub press 'e' at the kernel of your choice
